welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Antonio, where history, culture, and warmth converge to create a truly unique experience. Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's charming blend of Texan and Mexican influences and discover all that this vibrant destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all that San Antonio has to offer!

restaurants.name: Ram's Grill House
restaurants.description: Ram's Grill House is a filipino restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.description: New Ocean View Bar is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and domestic flights for smaller airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
